ques: The business world is highly ________ and competitive.
The twins look ________ and are often mistaken for each other.
This novel is considered a literary ________.
Earth's resources are ________ and need to be conserved.
She is the ________ owner of the company.
Scientists are trying to ________ the cause of the disease.
The ________ of today's discussion is climate change.
Smoking is ________ in most public buildings.
Organisms can ________ to their environments over time.
They make a lovely ________.
I'd like to choose a research ________ that interests me.
The ________ purpose of the meeting is to discuss the budget.
The film is a ________ of the science fiction genre.
We have a ________ amount of time to complete the project.
They decided to ________ themselves from the rest of the world.
The law ________ the sale of alcohol to minors.
She has a ________ personality and is full of energy.
The two keys are ________ and can open the same lock.
We need to ________ to the changing circumstances.
I saw a ________ of birds in the garden.
This software can ________ to different screen sizes.
These two cars are nearly ________ in appearance.
The universe is vast, but it's not ________.
The sign clearly states that parking is ________ here.
Many people still enjoy reading ________ literature.
It's essential to ________ the variables in the experiment.
His ________ responsibility is to oversee the project.
We need a ________ more ingredients for the recipe.
The ________ nature of technology requires adaptation.
The professor introduced the main ________ of the lecture.
A ________ team can achieve great results.
The school rules ________ the use of cell phones in class.
Our budget is ________, so we must use it wisely.
________ books often have timeless themes.
They've been married for a ________ of decades.
What is the main ________ of the book you're reading?
The ability to ________ is essential for survival.
The small island was ________ from the mainland.
The store's ________ focus is on selling shoes.
The test results were ________ for both groups.
Their handwriting is so ________ that it's hard to tell them apart.
This is the ________ reason for my decision.
Can you give me a ________ of examples?
It's important to ________ to new technologies.
There is a ________ number of possibilities.
The ________ nature of the market makes predictions difficult.
The government may ________ certain imports for safety reasons.
Please select a ________ for your presentation.
What are some of the ________ works of art?
She felt ________ and lonely in the new city.
